faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Hebrew Learning

faq1.question: What age is best to start learning Hebrew letters?
faq1.answer: Children can start recognizing Hebrew letters as early as 2-3 years old. Our app works for all ages, with activities suitable for young learners. Early exposure to Hebrew sounds and visual recognition creates strong foundations for future Hebrew reading and writing skills.

faq2.question: How long should daily Hebrew practice sessions be?
faq2.answer: We recommend 10-15 minute sessions for optimal learning. Short, frequent practice is more effective than long sessions.

faq3.question: Do I need to know Hebrew to help my child learn?
faq3.answer: Not at all! Our app provides authentic Hebrew pronunciation for every letter, number, and word. Parents can learn alongside their children. The interface supports multiple languages while maintaining focus on Hebrew learning objectives.

faq4.question: What makes this Hebrew learning app different from others?
faq4.answer: Our app combines authentic Hebrew audio, interactive games, and educational methodologies. We focus exclusively on Hebrew learning with native pronunciation and right-to-left reading practice.

faq5.question: Can my child use this app independently?
faq5.answer: Yes! The app is designed for independent learning while encouraging parent participation. Clear visual cues, audio instructions, and intuitive navigation allow children to explore and learn at their own pace while parents can observe and provide support.

faq6.question: What devices does the Hebrew learning app work on?
faq6.answer: Our web-based app works on all devices - tablets, phones, computers, and smart TVs. No downloads required! The responsive design ensures optimal learning experience across all screen sizes with touch-friendly interfaces perfect for young learners.

about.approachText: We believe children learn best through play and exploration. Every element in Lepdy is designed with young learners in mind - from the colorful, friendly interface to the authentic Hebrew pronunciation recorded by a native Israeli child. Our multisensory approach combines visual, auditory, and interactive elements to create an engaging learning experience.
about.madeWithLoveText: Lepdy was created by a parent who wanted to help their child learn Hebrew. The app features real pronunciation by Noa, ensuring children hear authentic Hebrew from the very start of their learning journey.

safety.intro: At Lepdy, we take child safety and privacy very seriously. Our app is designed to provide a safe, educational environment for young learners.
safety.noAdsText: Lepdy is completely ad-free. Children can learn without interruptions or exposure to inappropriate content.
safety.noDataCollectionText: We do not collect personal information from children. Your child's privacy is protected at all times.
safety.parentalControlsText: Parent-only sections are protected by a simple math gate that children typically cannot solve, ensuring parents maintain control over app settings and information pages.
safety.offlineCapableText: The app contains only age-appropriate educational content carefully designed for children and families.
safety.coppaCompliantText: We are committed to protecting children's privacy and follow best practices for children's applications.

contact.feedbackText: Your feedback helps us improve Lepdy for all families. Let us know what features you'd like to see, report any issues, or share your child's learning success stories.
